This [93minterfacial[0m [93msynergy[0m [93mfacilitates[0m [93mdirectional[0m [93melectron[0m [93mtransfer[0m from [93mFe[0m [93msites[0m to the [93mcarbon[0m [93mmatrix[0m and [93mresults[0m in [93mregioselective[0m [93mcatalysis[0m, [93menhancing[0m [93mMEA[0m [93mdegradation[0m [93mkinetics[0m by [93m4[0m.[93m85[0m-[93mfold[0m. [93mPractical[0m [93mviability[0m for [93mwastewater[0m [93mremediation[0m is [93mconfirmed[0m through [93mlife[0m [93mcycle[0m [93massessment[0m and [93mextended[0m [93moperation[0m. This [93mstrategy[0m [93mestablishes[0m a [93mgeneralized[0m [92mdesign[0m [93mprinciple[0m for [93mprecise[0m [93mreaction[0m [93mcontrol[0m [93mvia[0m the [93morchestration[0m of [93mcoupled[0m [93mspatial[0m and [93melectronic[0m [93meffects[0m within [93mengineered[0m [93mmicroenvironments[0m.
- [93mStrengthening[0m the [93mElectrocatalytic[0m [93mHydrogen[0m [93mEvolution[0m [93mProcess[0m by [93mStructure[0m [92mDesign[0m and [93mAtomic[0m-[93mLevel[0m [93mRegulation[0m of [93mTransition[0m [93mMetal[0m [93mPhosphides[0m.: [93mTransition[0m [93mmetal[0m [93mphosphides[0m ([93mTMPs[0m) [93mexhibit[0m [93mattracted[0m [93mapplication[0m [93mprospect[0m as [93mactive[0m [93melectrocatalysts[0m for the [93mhydrogen[0m [93mevolution[0m [93mreaction[0m ([93mHER[0m) through [93mwater[0m [93melectrolysis[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mtheir[0m [93mcompositional[0m and [93mstructural[0m [93madvantages[0m. [93mRecent[0m [93mstudies[0m [93mhave[0m [93mshown[0m that [93mhydrogen[0m [93mproduction[0m [93mcan[0m be [93menhanced[0m by [93mmodulating[0m the [93mmicrostructure[0m of [93mTMPs[0m [93mcatalysts[0m, but the [93munderstanding[0m is [93mincomplete[0m, while [93mrational[0m [92mdesign[0m [93mprinciples[0m at the [93mnanostructure[0m or even [93matomic[0m [93mscale[0m are [93mstill[0m [93mlacking[0m. [93mHere[0m, the [93mauthors[0m [93msystematically[0m [93msummarize[0m the [93mexisting[0m [93mresearch[0m [93mprogress[0m in [93mmodulating[0m [93mTMPs[0m [93melectrocatalysts[0m from [93mnanostructures[0m to [93msingle[0m [93matoms[0m to [93menhance[0m [93mHER[0m. The [93mlatest[0m [93mstrategies[0m to [93menhance[0m the [93mcatalytic[0m [93mactivity[0m of [93mTMPs[0m are [93msummarized[0m. Then, the [93mscaling[0m [93meffects[0m in [93mTMPs[0m [93mcatalysts[0m are [93mdiscussed[0m from the [93mnanoscale[0m and [93matomic[0m [93mscale[0m, [93mrespectively[0m, [93mbased[0m on which [93mrational[0m [92mdesign[0m [93mprinciples[0m for [93mimproving[0m the [93mactivity[0m and [93mstability[0m of [93mTMPs[0m with [93msingle[0m-[93matom[0m [93mcatalysts[0m are [93mproposed[0m. This [93mreview[0m [93mprovides[0m a [93mtheoretical[0m [93mreference[0m for the [92mdesign[0m of [93mhigh[0m [93mactivity[0m and [93mhigh[0m [93matom[0m [93mutilization[0m [93mcatalysts[0m for [93mhydrogen[0m [93mproduction[0m.
